comments:
During the delta processing of a system component, I got this NPE:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.pde.api.tools.internal.model.component.ApiComponentDescription$ManifestNode.access$5(ApiComponentDescription.java:50)
	at org.eclipse.pde.api.tools.internal.model.component.ApiComponentDescription.findNode(ApiComponentDescription.java:223)
	at org.eclipse.pde.api.tools.internal.model.component.ApiComponentDescription.resolveAPIDescription(ApiComponentDescription.java:239)
	at org.eclipse.pde.api.tools.comparator.ApiComparator$1.visit(ApiComparator.java:136)
	at org.eclipse.pde.api.tools.internal.model.component.ArchiveClassFileContainer.accept(ArchiveClassFileContainer.java:165)
	at org.eclipse.pde.api.tools.comparator.ApiComparator.compare(ApiComparator.java:133)
	at org.eclipse.pde.api.tools.comparator.ApiComparator.compare(ApiComparator.java:105)
	at org.eclipse.pde.api.tools.internal.builder.DeltaBuilder.process(DeltaBuilder.java:154)
	at org.eclipse.pde.api.tools.internal.builder.DeltaBuilder.buildAll(DeltaBuilder.java:120)
	at org.eclipse.pde.api.tools.internal.builder.DeltaBuilder.build(DeltaBuilder.java:58)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager$2.run(BuildManager.java:629)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.SafeRunner.run(SafeRunner.java:37)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager.basicBuild(BuildManager.java:166)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager.basicBuild(BuildManager.java:197)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager$1.run(BuildManager.java:249)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.SafeRunner.run(SafeRunner.java:37)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager.basicBuild(BuildManager.java:252)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager.basicBuildLoop(BuildManager.java:305)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager.build(BuildManager.java:337)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.build(Workspace.java:330)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.GlobalBuildAction$1.run(GlobalBuildAction.java:183)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)

it seems that in the findNode method for an ApiComponentDescription, if the the node we are looking for is not in the map and we are not doing an insertion, we break oiut of the for loop with node and parentNode == null, so when we check for overrides <BOOM> NPE.

fixed in HEAD

added unit tests
